1.5.name: wordpress/adwork-media-ez-content-locker
1.5.description:
Easily integrate your AdWork Media Content & File Locker into your WordPress site.

This plugin will allow you to easily setup an AdWork Media Content Locker on pages and posts of your choice. An AdWork Media account is required.

Overview:

  • Easily filter pages or posts for the Content Locker to "always display" or "never display".
  • No need to edit the header.php file directly.
  • Supports multiple Content Locker profiles.
